title: US stocks end higher as Apple results spark equities
text: 4.05pm: Tech stocks rally but the Nasdaq still headed for its worst month since October 2008 US stocks finished the trading session higher, led strong financial results from Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL). At the close, the Dow gained 565 points to 34,726, while the S&P 500 added 105 points at 4,432 and the tech-heavy Nasdaq climbed 418 points to 13,771.

title: 35 AGs, DoJ, Microsoft agree with Epic: They say Apple blunts competition
text: Apple Inc. is blunting competition through its mobile app store, attorneys general for 34 U.S. states and the District of Columbia, the U.S. Justice Department, Microsoft Corp. and antitrust experts said in multiple court filings to a California appeals court late Thursday.

title: Apple stock upside looks promising after record results, Metaverse plans
text: California-based Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) reported earnings of $2.10 a share on record revenue of $123.95 billion, compared to Wall Street analysts consensus for earnings of $1.89 a share on $118.4 billion in revenue. Tim Cook's plan to invest heavily in the metaverse and expand its augmented reality apps is also lauded by investors.

title: Earnings reporters Apple, Visa are the only Dow stocks rising premarket
text: Shares of earnings reporters Apple Inc. AAPL, -0.29% and Visa Inc. V, +0.14% are the only two of the Dow Jones Industrial Average's DJIA, -0.02% 30 components that are gaining ground in the premarket, while those of fellow earnings reporters Caterpillar Inc. CAT, -0.99% and Chevron Corp. CVX, +2.02% were among the bigger Dow losers. Combined, the earnings reporters were providing about 14-point support to the Dow's price, while Dow futures YM00, -0.88% tumbled 323 points, or 1.0%.

title: Futures fall as rate hike worries eclipse strong Apple results
text: U.S. stock futures slipped on Friday and continued with its January rout, as the prospect of a series of interest rate hikes to tame inflation clouded stellar results from the world's largest company by market value, Apple Inc.
